description: Liyanapathirange Punchihewa Babynona Vs. Hethuhamige Ranasinghe - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J before  Possession of State land is permitted only when a valid permit or written authority issued by the Govt. is produced.
parties: Liyanapathirange Punchihewa Babynona Vs. Hethuhamige Ranasinghe - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J
